Who we are
We are the industry leader in online lottery courier services, with a 20-year track record and a stellar reputation. Since 2002 we’ve paid out over $120 million in prizes to more than 8 million winning tickets from around the globe.
Play it global anytime, anywhere
We give players the opportunity to play for the biggest jackpots on the planet online! Play exciting draw games like US Powerball, US Mega Millions, EuroMillions, SuperEnalotto, and more – all from the comfort of home or on the go with your phone.
